name: MATCH ME (AAhmed9)
description:
Match me is my puzzle game on Unity where you have to match at least 3 items to gain points. 

This game was easily designable to understand and it had no problem creating. I added extra elements to make Match Me more enjoyable like matching gems in groups of 3 or more; add bombs and other custom objects into levels; creating custom layouts; an objective to get three stars in every level; a complete level select system and adding audio to Match Me. 

What I learned creating Match Me was mainly its interactive menus and understanding the capabilities of 2D development in Unity. My problem-solving skills have developed my game development because of its object-oriented programming works in place.

Controls: left click to move objects
